body: An IP_Port is a fairly large data structure, and copying them down the call stack creates a lot of unnecessary overhead. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1954)

commit.message:
Make functions take const pointer to IP_Port wherever possible

An IP_Port is a fairly large data structure, and copying them down
the call stack creates a lot of unnecessary overhead.

verification.payload:
tree ae312f5a7ddb321ab2e8b38d1362dfc71266f456
parent 3a72ed5fae10a8001962063b773e1d5f66885112
author jfreegman <jfreegman@gmail.com> 1643832143 -0500
committer jfreegman <jfreegman@gmail.com> 1643903688 -0500

Make functions take const pointer to IP_Port wherever possible

An IP_Port is a fairly large data structure, and copying them down
the call stack creates a lot of unnecessary overhead.

commit.message:
Make more functions take const pointers to IP_Port

We additionally now make local copies of the IP_Port param instead
of modifying the passed argument
